name: Introduction to Astronomy
description: This course is an introduction to the science of astronomy and its subfields.

name: Observational Astronomy
description: This course is an introduction to observational astronomy techniques.

name: Astronomical Data Analysis
description: This course is an introduction to astronomical data analysis and modeling.

name: Astrophysics I
description: This course is an introduction to the astrophysical principles and processes.

name: Astrophysics II
description: This course is a continuation of Astrophysics I, covering more advanced topics.
